bm_desc: SEPC LIMITED has informed the Exchange about Board Meeting to be held on 28-Nov-2024 to consider Conversions of FCD.
Intimation under Regulation 29 of SEBI LODR regarding  the Meeting of Board of Directors of the Company proposed to be held on November 28, 2024. Detailed Letter is enclosed.
